page.title: 05Questionaire Churchgate St
page.content:
We had more replies to our{question- {aire}from retired people{(OAP's)}than from people who are working. As we collected the questionaires during the day, only the retired people were at home. So we can't give information about working people.
18 OAP's replied. 5 had been resident in the village for more than 50 years, {4 between 30 and 50 years,}2 between 10 and 29 years and{7 for less than 10 {years.}
Of those who had been resident for more than 30 years 8 had some or most of their relatives living within 5 miles.
11 Of the OAP's depended on the local bus service
